title: Sidewall And Border, 1972-42-216-a,b, 1810–30
description:
a) Different size floral bouquets with various types of flowers and leaves on a striped taupe background.  Circular motif on edge.  Shades of red, shades of green, taupe, and white.
b) Bases of Corinthian-like style columns connect by stylized floral swags and fabric.  Shades of red, shades of green, taupe, and white.
